title: Game doesn't launch anymore.
body:
Recently, my game started crashing whenever I tried to connect to a game. After champ select, I get a "League of Legends Client Has Stopped Working" pop-up instantly. Same when I try to reconnect. So I reinstalled the game and it seemed to get fixed, but after 2 more games, it started happening again. (I have tried using Hextech Repair Tool)

Any Ideas?

replies.body: HRT can help if you're attempting to auto-configure your firewall settings, but not necessarily a reinstall.  This specific issue seems to be related to an unstable connection struggling to get to our game server.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide instead to troubleshoot this towards a fix.

I tried doing most of the stuff on the connection issues guide but nothing has worked. I thought that flushing dns worked for a custom, but when I tried to join a normal game, it stopped working again.

Aw bummer it didn't end up working out. In that case, grab the logs from the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be able to dig into this with you individually and find some solutions.
